#Introduction to Netdis

This package contains multiple vignettes that illustrate the simple ways of employing the network comparison methods 'Netdis' and 'NetEmd', and also the large flexibility of these methodologies. The following is a list of the avialable vignettes:

[Simple and quick use](netdis_pairwise_comparisons.html).
